document.full_text: critics are panning the made-for-television movie about prince william and kate middleton's wedding that airs on lifetime on april 18 and in the u.k. on april 24. but they still think it'll be a huge hit.
document.title: prince william and kate middleton telefilm "awful"
lines_and_colors: critics are panning the made-for-television movie about prince william and kate middleton's wedding that airs on lifetime on april 18 and in the u.k. on april 24. but they still think it'll be a huge hit.
